channel.title: Heyo on People Of The Book
channel.description: Recent content in Heyo on People Of The Book

item.title: 5 Minute Hifz
item.author: pob@aol.com (Adnan Baig)
item.description: A first principles approach to Quran memorisation. For peoople who want to be Hafeez but can’t find the time.

item.title: Sketches!
item.author: pob@aol.com (Adnan Baig)
item.description: Sketches are the pretty visualizations in heyo’s sidebar. The default ones were built using p5.js – a javascript library for creative coding.

item.title: Badges
item.author: pob@aol.com (Adnan Baig)
item.description: This article will show you how to add and customize badges in your posts.
